SQL.LOAD: SELECT comuna_alias, comuna_code_id, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, comuna_alias_id FROM elp_comuna_standardization WHERE comuna_alias_id = :comuna_alias_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT cs.comuna_alias_id, cs.comuna_alias, cs.comuna_code_id, c.comuna, r.country_id, cs.created_by, cs.created_date, cs.modified_by, cs.modified_date FROM elp_comuna_standardization cs, elp_comuna_code c, elp_region r WHERE cs.comuna_code_id = c.comuna_code_id AND c.region_id = r.region_id AND UPPER(cs.comuna_alias) LIKE :comuna_alias AND UPPER(c.comuna) LIKE :comuna AND r.country_id in (SELECT co.country_id FROM elp_user_company uc, elp_company co WHERE co.company_id = uc.company_id AND uc.user_id=:user_id) order by c.comuna
SQL.GET_COMUNA_LIST: SELECT c.comuna_code_id id, c.comuna description, c.region_id FROM elp_comuna_code c, elp_region r WHERE c.region_id = r.region_id AND r.country_id in (SELECT co.country_id FROM elp_user_company uc, elp_company co WHERE co.company_id = uc.company_id AND uc.user_id=:user_id) ORDER BY c.comuna
SQL.GET_COMUNA_STANDARDIZATION_LIST: select cs.COMUNA_ALIAS_ID id, c.comuna_code_id, cs.COMUNA_ALIAS description FROM elp_comuna_code c, ELP_COMUNA_STANDARDIZATION cs, elp_region r WHERE c.region_id = r.region_id and c.COMUNA_CODE_ID = cs.COMUNA_CODE_ID AND r.country_id in (SELECT co.country_id FROM elp_user_company uc, elp_company co WHERE co.company_id = uc.company_id AND uc.user_id=:user_id) and comuna_alias = :comuna_alias ORDER BY cs.COMUNA_ALIAS
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_comuna_standardization SET comuna_alias = :comuna_alias, comuna_code_id = :comuna_code_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE comuna_alias_id = :comuna_alias_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_comuna_standardization ( comuna_alias, comuna_code_id, created_by, comuna_alias_id ) VALUES ( :comuna_alias, :comuna_code_id, :created_by, :comuna_alias_id )
